title: Spell
description: A schema for defining spells in the Pathfinder 1e simulation.

id.description: A unique identifier for the spell.

school.description: The school of magic (e.g., Evocation, Abjuration).

subschool.description: Optional subschool of magic if applicable.

spell_level.description: A mapping from class names to the level at which the spell is available (e.g., {"Wizard": 3, "Cleric": 2}).

casting_time.description: The time required to cast the spell (e.g., '1 standard action').

range.description: The effective range of the spell (e.g., 'Long (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)').

area_or_target.description: Specifies whether the spell targets a single creature or an area (e.g., 'Target', '20-ft.-radius spread').

area_shape.description: Specifies the shape of the area effect (e.g., 'burst', 'cone', 'line', 'emanation').

duration.description: The duration of the spell (e.g., 'Instantaneous', '1 round/level').

dismissible.description: Indicates if the spell is dismissible by the caster.

requires_concentration.description: Indicates if the spell requires concentration to maintain.

saving_throw.description: The saving throw required, if any (e.g., 'Reflex half', 'Will negates', 'None').

spell_resistance.description: Indicates if the spell is subject to spell resistance (e.g., 'Yes', 'No').

arcane_spell_failure.description: The percentage chance of arcane spell failure when cast in armor.

description.description: A detailed description of the spell's effects and any additional rules.

material_components.description: A description of material components required (if any), including any associated cost.

additional_effects.description: Optional field for extra effects or notes (e.g., special conditions, extra damage dice, or unique mechanics).

bonus_effects.description: List of bonus effects provided by the spell. Each bonus is defined by the affected stat, bonus amount, and bonus type.

bonus.description: The numerical value of the bonus.

conditions_applied.description: List of conditions applied by the spell, with details such as condition name, duration, and saving throw type (if any).

duration.description: The duration of the condition (e.g., '1 round/level').

save.description: The type of saving throw required to negate or reduce the condition, if applicable.

special_mechanics.description: An object for spell-specific mechanics such as summoning details, teleportation coordinates, or additional custom effects.

scaling.description: Details on how the spell scales with caster level (e.g., damage increase, duration extension, area expansion).

spell_type.description: Defines the spell's primary effect type (e.g., 'damage', 'buff', 'debuff', 'summoning', 'teleportation').
